data.lyric:
[ti:Why We Drink]
[ar:Justin Moore]
[al:Why We Drink]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Why We Drink - Justin Moore
[00:05.66]Lyrics by：Justin Moore/Casey Beathard/David Lee Murphy/Jeremy Stover
[00:11.33]Composed by：Justin Moore/Casey Beathard/David Lee Murphy/Jeremy Stover
[00:17.00]'Cause it's Friday
[00:19.06]'Cause it's Monday
[00:21.17]'Cause it's a charcoal burnin' Sunday
[00:25.25]'Cause we ain't gonna get to one day
[00:30.09]That's why we drink
[00:33.56]'Cause the sun's up
[00:35.60]'Cause it's sundown
[00:37.62]'Cause my wound up needs a little unwound
[00:41.66]'Cause we've been workin' all day but we're done now
[00:45.75]Yeah that's why we drink
[00:49.91]'Cause they're ice cold
[00:51.94]'Cause it's hot out
[00:53.90]'Cause we're Jon boat sittin' with the line out
[00:58.02]'Cause we're a little messed up
[01:00.55]But it's cheaper than a dang old shrink
[01:06.25]'Cause we're grown up
[01:08.33]'Cause we're still kids
[01:10.45]'Cause we love doin' things 'cause our daddies did
[01:14.47]'Cause it's alcohol abuse if you pour one down the sink
[01:21.08]Yeah that's why we drink
[01:30.85]'Cause our team lost
[01:32.95]'Cause our team won
[01:35.39]'Cause sweet home Alabama just came on
[01:39.01]'Cause we're lookin' for a reason to raise one
[01:43.15]Yeah that's why we drink
[01:47.38]'Cause they're ice cold
[01:49.40]'Cause it's hot out
[01:51.38]'Cause we're Jon Boat
[01:53.16]Sittin' with the line out
[01:55.45]'Cause we're a little messed up
[01:57.85]But it's cheaper than a dang old shrink
[02:03.65]'Cause we're grown up
[02:05.75]'Cause we're still kids
[02:07.78]'Cause we love doin' things 'cause our daddies did
[02:11.81]'Cause it's alcohol abuse if you pour one down the sink
[02:18.26]Yeah that's why we drink
[02:22.38]To good friends good times you and me
[02:26.32]To the red white and blue boys
[02:28.81]And girls overseas
[02:30.50]'Cause they're ice cold
[02:32.41]'Cause it's hot out
[02:34.42]'Cause we're Jon Boat
[02:36.21]Sittin' with the line out
[02:38.51]'Cause we're a little messed up
[02:40.89]But it's cheaper than a dang old shrink
[02:44.71]That's why we drink
[02:46.76]'Cause we're grown up
[02:48.84]'Cause we're still kids
[02:50.98]'Cause we love doin' things
[02:53.14]'Cause our daddies did
[02:54.94]'Cause it's alcohol abuse if you pour one down the sink
[03:01.39]Yeah that's why we drink
[03:05.69]Yeaeaeah
[03:09.83]That's why we drink
[03:18.52]That's why we drink
data.trans:
[ti:Why We Drink]
[ar:Justin Moore]
[al:Why We Drink]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.66]//
[00:11.33]//
[00:17.00]因为是星期五
[00:19.06]因为是星期一
[00:21.17]因为是热闹的星期天
[00:25.25]因为我们总有一天会离去
[00:30.09]所以我们喝酒
[00:33.56]因为太阳升起了
[00:35.60]因为太阳落山了
[00:37.62]因为我的伤口需要疗愈
[00:41.66]因为我们忙碌工作的一天终于结束了
[00:45.75]这就是我们喝酒的原因
[00:49.91]因为酒水透心凉
[00:51.94]因为外面天很热
[00:53.90]因为我们是Jon Boat 坐成一排闲聊
[00:58.02]因为我们有点烦恼
[01:00.55]但喝酒比找心理医生便宜
[01:06.25]因为我们长大了
[01:08.33]因为我们还是孩子
[01:10.45]因为我们喜欢做父辈做过的事情
[01:14.47]因为如果你把酒倒进水槽里 那就是在浪费
[01:21.08]这就是我们喝酒的原因
[01:30.85]因为我们的队伍输了
[01:32.95]因为我们的队伍赢了
[01:35.39]因为《Sweet Home Alabama》上映了
[01:39.01]因为我们都在找理由喝一杯
[01:43.15]这就是我们喝酒的原因
[01:47.38]因为酒水透心凉
[01:49.40]因为外面天很热
[01:51.38]因为我们是Jon Boat
[01:53.16]坐成一排闲聊
[01:55.45]因为我们有点烦恼
[01:57.85]但喝酒比找心理医生便宜
[02:03.65]因为我们长大了
[02:05.75]因为我们还是孩子
[02:07.78]因为我们喜欢做父辈做过的事情
[02:11.81]因为如果你把酒倒进水槽里 那就是在浪费
[02:18.26]这就是我们喝酒的原因
[02:22.38]敬好朋友 好时光 你和我
[02:26.32]敬各种肤色的男孩女孩
[02:28.81]世界各地的人
[02:30.50]因为酒水透心凉
[02:32.41]因为外面天很热
[02:34.42]因为我们是Jon Boat
[02:36.21]坐成一排闲聊
[02:38.51]因为我们有点烦恼
[02:40.89]但喝酒比找心理医生便宜
[02:44.71]所以我们喝酒
[02:46.76]因为我们长大了
[02:48.84]因为我们还是孩子
[02:50.98]因为我们喜欢做
[02:53.14]父辈做过的事情
[02:54.94]因为如果你把酒倒进水槽里 那就是在浪费
[03:01.39]这就是我们喝酒的原因
[03:05.69]//
[03:09.83]所以我们喝酒
[03:18.52]所以我们喝酒
